title: Yasashikunai Kimi ga Suki
original_name: やさしくないキミが好き
sinopse:
First year student Hiyoko looks up to Manabe, who looks like a manga hero she likes. But the real Manabe gets angry easily, has a bad mouth... totally different from a hero. Yet, he would randomly smile. Sometimes, he would be really gentle too?

(Source: Kodansha, translated)

Included one-shot: In My Rain
